title: Infinite Ascension Futuristic Engines - Sound FX & Shepard Tones
description: Futuristic adaptive engine sounds, spacecraft sfx, shepard tones and more
longDescription:
AAA-rated blockbuster film sound effects created using the latest FM synthesis and sound warping technologies.


Video Preview Here - Spaceship Effects

Video Preview Here - Motor Bike Engine effects


Preview Here


3 fully adaptive engine sfx were built using the latest synthesis technology. Change gear, accelerate, decelerate, turbo, supercharger, dump valves, engine starts, engine fails and much more. Perfect for pod racers, spaceships, futuristic bikes and cars etc

Included in the pack are 70 ascending and descending Shepard Tones built from engine sounds and analog synthesizers. A Shepard Tone is an audio illusion effect that gives the listener the feeling that a sound if constantly going up or down in pitch when it is in fact a loop. Perfect for racing and sci-fi action sounds, or used as a constant tension creation and suspense tool. All Shepard Tones are seamless loops and easily integrated into your Unreal Project.


Built from:

Car V8 Engine

Super bike

Jet Engine

Light Aircraft (prop engine)

Boat Engine

Synthesised Spaceship effects

FM modulated engines

Analog Synthesisers


Lifetime updates included
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 70 seamless Shepard Tone loops
  • 60 adaptive engine sounds. Build your own reactive sci-fi engine using these hi-tech sounds
  • 36 Ascending Shepard Tones
  • 34 Descending Shepard Tones
  • 27 Accelerating SpaceCraft Sci-Fi sounds and riser hit SFX
  • 14 Sci-Fi Engine SFX - Dumpvalves, Turbo, Supercharger, Boost, Fail

Number of Audio Waves: 171

Number of Audio Cues: 171

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: All
